de.rojer.images

Class ImageFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.rojer.images.ImageFile

  • public class ImageFile
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can be used to load in images and textures. Saves the width, height and pixel-data. Additionally this information is stored in a bufferedimage-object. The path to the file and the name of the file are saved too.
    Version:
    17.03.2019
    Author:
    Rojer

      • ImageFile

        public ImageFile(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                 int width,
                 int height)
        Create an scaled image-object
        Parameters:
        image - the bufferedimage-object to be used
        width - the new width (smaller or equal 0 for normal width)
        height - the new height (smaller or equal 0 for normal height)

      • ImageFile

        public ImageFile(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                 float scaleX,
                 float scaleY)
        Create an scaled image-object
        Parameters:
        image - the bufferedimage-object to be used
        scaleX - the factor to scale the width with (greater 0)
        scaleY - the factor to scale the height with (greater 0)
